name: Auto Meta Keywords
author: mansurahamed

sections.description:
This plugin automatically gets the keywords of your post/page content and shows them in the meta keywords tag. Meta keywords tag can be used when determining the page relevance to search queries by the search engines.
Example of meta keywords tag would be like this

meta name=”keywords” content=”blogging, hiking, writing, skills”

Its comptiable with popular page builders like Elementor, Divi, Wpbakery, Gutenberg editor etc. Super fast, doesn’t effect page load speed.
Use the filter “amk_custom_keywords” to set custom keywords for any specific post.

Official Developer: Mansur Ahamed
sections.installation:
All you’ll need to do to get this setup is:

  1. Install and Activate the plugin.

That’s it!
sections.faq:
Do I need to know any coding to use this plugin?

No.

Does the plugin work with any WordPress theme?

Yes. It doesn’t depend on any theme or plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Initial release on wordpress.org

1.0.2

  • Compatibility confirmation for wordpress 6.2

1.0.3

  • Compatibility confirmation for wordpress 6.3.1
  • Added support for page builder plugins
  • fixed the 0 keyword bug
